changeSet.sql: UPDATE user_details SET account_request_status = CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM user_mails um WHERE um.user_id = user_details.user_id AND um.mail_type IN ('REJECTION', 'REJECTION_US_SANCTION', 'REJECT_ALUMNI_ADDRESS') ) THEN 'REJECTED' WHEN (SELECT u.activated FROM jhi_user u WHERE u.id = user_details.user_id) = true THEN 'APPROVED' ELSE 'PENDING' END WHERE account_request_status IS NULL;
